members.name: Zeke Workman

armor.name: Enderstrike Armor
armor.style: Agile black-and-purple strike suit with Ender-inspired energy motifs and teleport nodes

abilities: Short-range Ender-style teleportation bursts
Summoning shadowy duplicates as decoys or skirmishers
Adaptive combat tactics, reading and countering enemy patterns
Coordinating Monke Alliance attacks with precise timing
members.personality: Strategic, stubborn, loyal to his crew, always thinking three moves ahead while quietly carrying the weight of the Bludbruhs split.
members.lore_summary: After Melcornia and the Bludbruhs Civil War-style split, Zeke rejected Sam’s darker path and led the nimble, rebellious Monke Alliance as a counter-force to Thunder Born, operating at the edges of Parliament control.
members.notes: If there’s a truce between Monke and Thunder Born, Zeke is usually the one who negotiated it—and the first to break it if Sam crosses a line.

members.name: Elijah Potter

armor.name: Chaos Wither Armor
armor.style: Jagged, dark armor with unstable energy veins and wither-styled sigils

abilities: Unstable energy blasts that corrode or weaken structures
Localized entropy fields that break enemy formations
High-risk, high-reward attacks that alter the terrain
Channeling chaotic power while relying on Monke to keep him grounded
members.personality: Intense, a bit volatile, but fiercely loyal when he decides someone is worth his chaos.
members.lore_summary: Elijah walked the line between destructive power and control; in Monke Alliance, that raw chaos became a weapon pointed away from friends and straight at anyone threatening them.
members.notes: When Zeke calls for a ‘wither play,’ everyone knows things are about to get messy.

members.name: Tom C

armor.name: Thunder Whisperer Armor
armor.style: Resonant plating with audio-channel conduits, tuned for precise sonic pulses and shockwaves

abilities: Sonic control—from barely audible tones to room-shaking blasts
Sound dampening fields to cloak allies or mute explosions
Harmonic pulses that can destabilize terrain or enemy formations
Subtle resonance waves that help calm teammates under stress
members.personality: Soft-spoken but powerful, Tom is the steady beat underneath Monke’s chaos.
members.lore_summary: Tom’s sonic gifts grew out of Melcornia’s echoes, and when he followed Zeke into Monke Alliance, his sound waves became the rhythm that keeps the team in sync and opponents off-balance.
members.notes: If a fight suddenly feels eerily quiet or overwhelmingly loud, that’s Tom reshaping the soundstage.

members.name: Ammon T
members.role_on_team: Support Specialist / Face of the Alliance

armor.name: Quick Wit Armor
armor.style: Lightweight, expressive armor tuned for agility, non-lethal tools, and rapid response

abilities: Enhanced reaction time and combat reflexes
De-escalation and diplomacy under fire
On-the-fly tactical improvisation
Specialized gear focused on non-lethal takedowns and crowd control
members.personality: Charming, empathetic, and fast on his feet—both in banter and in battle.
members.lore_summary: Ammon became the emotional bridge of the Monke Alliance, using humor and heart to hold the squad together as they stepped away from Thunder Born and tried to define their own brand of heroism.
members.notes: Often the first to crack a joke and the first to notice when someone else is not okay.

members.name: Eli C

armor.name: Shadow Hunter Armor
armor.style: Dark, predator-like suit built for silent movement, tracking, and ambush strikes

abilities: Near-silent movement and advanced tracking
Shadow-based camouflage and low-light sight
Marking and tailing high-value targets
Coordinating ambushes with Zeke’s teleportation plays
members.personality: Calm, focused, and a little spooky—Eli is the one you don’t see until he wants you to.
members.lore_summary: Eli turned his knack for vanishing into Monke’s recon backbone, the first into hostile zones and the last one enemies notice before the team hits.
members.notes: Shadow Hunter and Shadow (the dog) are an unspoken duo—if you see one, the other isn’t far.

members.name: Ethan T

armor.name: Bolt Watcher Armor
armor.style: Blue-white lightning-trim armor built for speed, aerial slides, and high-voltage hits

abilities: Lightning generation and precise bolt projection
Superhuman agility and rapid repositioning
Enhanced perception for spotting threats early
Channeling electricity into allies’ gear or Monke tech
members.personality: High-energy, vigilant, always scanning the horizon for the next storm.
members.lore_summary: Struck by the fallout of Sam’s corruption, Ethan turned that spark into a disciplined, high-speed support role—now racing ahead of Monke Alliance to keep them one step ahead of disaster.
members.notes: When the hair on your arms stands up, Ethan has already seen what’s coming.

members.name: Alex M

armor.name: Swiftmind Armor
armor.style: Streamlined data-driven suit with HUD overlays and predictive targeting systems

abilities: High-speed data analysis and battle forecasting
HUD-based threat mapping and AoE risk calculation
Coordinating flanks and ambushes for the team
On-field intel relay to Zeke and the others
members.personality: Quietly sharp, observant, and a bit sarcastic, Alex prefers to let results speak for him.
members.lore_summary: When the Monke Alliance splintered off, Alex became their living battle-computer, turning chaos into patterns that Zeke could actually command and the others could trust.
members.notes: If Monke pulls off something that looks impossible, odds are Alex ran the numbers first.

members.name: Damon

armor.name: Pixel Maverick Armor
armor.style: Glitchy, hologram-lined armor with pixel-flare emitters and AR trick-projectors

abilities: Hard-light and holographic projections for misdirection
‘Glitch-step’ movement that mimics teleportation visually
Digital overwatch and battlefield UI scrambling
Projecting false Monke positions or fake Thunder Born signatures
members.personality: Playful, chaotic, and creative in a way that drives enemies—and sometimes teammates—crazy.
members.lore_summary: Damon turned Monke Alliance into a walking magic trick, using illusions and glitches to help them fight much bigger, heavier factions on their own terms.
members.notes: Loves turning serious showdowns into visual chaos that only Monke can read correctly.

members.name: Lauren

armor.name: Stealth Queen Armor
armor.style: Gold-accented jungle-stealth suit blending elegance with ambush capability

abilities: High-level infiltration and disguise work
Reading social dynamics and extracting intel quietly
Coordinating low-profile missions away from Parliament eyes
members.personality: Calm, composed, and hard to rattle—she moves like she already knows how the scene ends.
members.lore_summary: Lauren earned ‘Legend’ status by slipping in and out of situations that should have been impossible, bringing back intel Monke shouldn’t have survived without.
members.notes: Her ops rarely make it into official records, which is exactly how she likes it.

members.name: Lizzie

armor.name: Seriene Suit
armor.style: Soft-lit armor with calm neon lines and subtle shielding fields

abilities: Emotional grounding and de-escalation in the field
Low-key defensive barriers and personal shields
Keeping Monke from tipping too far into reckless chaos
members.personality: Gentle but firm, the one who reminds everyone why they fight in the first place.
members.lore_summary: Lizzie’s presence turns Monke missions from ‘barely-held-together chaos’ into something with a heart and a direction, making her a quiet legend in the squad.
members.notes: If she tells Zeke a line is too far, he actually listens.

members.name: Rachel

armor.name: Neon Armor
armor.style: Bright, glowing suit with speed lines and festival-energy color pops

abilities: Light-trail movement that confuses enemies
Blinding flares and visual disruption
High morale impact—lifting team energy in long campaigns
members.personality: Bright, energetic, and unapologetically loud—in color and in spirit.
members.lore_summary: Rachel turned light itself into a weapon and a celebration, earning a ‘Legend’ slot by keeping Monke moving when everything else felt dark.
members.notes: Her arrival usually means the battlefield is about to look like an EDM concert with a body count.

members.name: Keith

armor.name: Operative Armor
armor.style: Heavy-duty urban ops armor focused on durability and tactical gear

abilities: Coordinating gear, drops, and extraction routes
Holding the line when everyone else needs to fall back
Acting as Monke’s quiet shield in worst-case scenarios
members.lore_summary: Keith doesn’t chase spotlight or codex entries—he just shows up where Monke is about to break and refuses to let the line fall.
members.notes: When plans collapse, Zeke’s first question is usually, ‘Where’s Keith?’

members.name: Sandra

armor.name: Informant Gear
armor.style: Low-profile urban rig designed to blend in and record everything

abilities: Maintaining a web of contacts beyond Parliament’s reach
Information trading, rumor filtering, and tip verification
Feeding Monke just enough intel to stay ahead without burning sources
members.personality: Careful, observant, and guarded—trust is earned on her timeline.
members.lore_summary: Sandra’s intel built the routes Monke used to survive post-Bludbruhs, making her a legend to anyone who’s ever relied on a safe alley or a quiet contact in Zion.
members.notes: If Sandra doesn’t want to be found, not even Legion or Thunder Born will spot her.

members.name: Shadow

armor.name: Gray Hound Harness
armor.style: Light combat harness with trackers and small camera mounts

abilities: Tracking scents across sectors and rubble
Sensing danger and warning the team
Keeping morale up just by existing
members.personality: Loyal, brave, and sharper than half the people who underestimate him.
members.lore_summary: Originally Sam’s dog, Shadow stayed tied to the wider circle through Monke and Thunder Born both, becoming a living reminder of who they all used to be—and who they might still be again.
members.notes: Everyone agrees on one ceasefire rule: you don’t fire near Shadow.
